Office of Global Services
blurb: The Office of Global Services serves as a resource for faculty and administrators engaged globally and for international students and scholars on Northeastern’s campuses. The office provides professional expertise and support to students and scholars around their academic and employment experiences.

title: Office of the General Counsel
blurb: The Office of the General Counsel is responsible for all aspects of the legal representation of Northeastern. The office centralizes and coordinates all legal services at the university, and provides legal advice, guidance, and services to all senior university officials and their departments.

title: Office of Human Resources Management
blurb: The Human Resources Management office designs, develops, and continually refines a comprehensive human resources management program that attracts, rewards, and retains high-quality faculty and staff to meet Northeastern’s educational mission.

title: Office of Institutional Diversity and Inclusion
blurb: The Institutional Diversity and Inclusion office works with students, faculty, administrators, and staff to manage conflict and resolve complaints of discrimination and harassment. The office develops programs and policies, builds outreach to external organizations, and provides services to students, faculty, staff, and the community.

title: Ombuds Office
blurb: The Ombuds office offers a safe place for Northeastern faculty and staff to confidentially discuss workplace issues and concerns with a professional whose goal it is to ensure that all members of the university community are treated fairly and equitably.

title: We Care
blurb: The We Care office supports students who experience unexpected challenges in maintaining their academic progress. We Care works with students to coordinate assistance among university offices and to offer appropriate on- and off-campus referrals. The office also provides guidance to faculty and staff in identifying Northeastern resources and policies to help students succeed.
